ratings.comment: This is one of the worst professors Ive ever had. She was unhelpful, monotone as heck, and was unable to speak coherent sentences. I spent more time in this class then the rest of my classes combined, and the TAs and the homeworks dont help. AVOID AT ALL COSTS

I feel bad for Zoe because she is a grad student and I am sure she did her best, but she was not helpful and made this class way more difficult than it needed to be. She does not know how to lecture or answer questions from her students. Tests and homework assignments were very difficult and graded way too harshly.

If youre looking for an easy 3-credit science course, STAY AWAY. Professor Zibton had about as much understanding of the material as the rest of the class. Homework was much harder than lecture. Concepts from lecture felt more like a 200 or 300 level course. Exams, although only multiple choice, were also difficult. Avoid this professor.

The course content was very clearly beyond her teaching capabilities. Lecture was a constant mess of her stumbling over her own words and failing to really explain anything. The homework requires more depth and knowledge than what is given in class and is graded very harshly. I never got higher than a C on any of them.

Zoe is a grad student and this (fall 2019) is her first time teaching. I feel bad that she was stuck with this position at the end of August right before classes began. She is a kind person, but is obviously stressed and uncomfortable lecturing. Homework is nothing like what is taught in class. Exams are memorization. Not an easy A!

Literally reads straight off the slides for every lecture, and you can tell she doesn't know what she is talking about. Whenever someone asks a question, she talks forever about nothing, and then eventually reads directly off the slide again.
Reads off every slide word for word. Never goes into detail about how the weather actually is formed. Homework is extremely difficult and nothing like the exams. Lots of reading.

For a Grad Student as a professor, really not that bad. Could have been way worse. This is her first year teaching the class so I would keep in mind that she has a lot more potential to be a good teacher. Hopefully she will get better as time goes on.

Y'all need to stop hating on Zoe just because she's a grad student, it's not her fault the University couldn't get a legit professor for us. That being said, I am always confused in class. She reads off the slides so you don't necessarily have to show up to understand the content. Homework is graded harshly but you just have to be really specific.

She is the worst teacher ever. Nobody understands one thing she ever says. She can't even answer questions from students. She mumbles and says um every three words. Homework is nothing like what we learn in class. This class is horrible and nobody should take it.

Honestly the worst professor that I have ever had. She mumbles through class and she just reads off the slides in hopes of us understanding what is on the slide that someone else wrote. Homework is graded super hard and we cant get help on it. Worth 50 points and the average is around 35. We had a sub for 2 weeks and the other prof was stellar.

She does not know to teach and mubles through the lecture. Her slides are not helpful and she is very confusing. It does not appear she understands the subject well and often gives the wrong answers to simple questions. The TA's said the HW is not intended to help us for test, only to make us work on stuff. Do not take this class.

She is HORRIBLE. Hands down the worst professor/class I have ever had. She is so confusing in lecture and WILL NOT help you outside of class. Orders her TA's to not give help on the homework. If you need to take a physical science credit WHATEVER YOU DO DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS.
